description: I guess the interface could be a bit neater and consistent with the look of the shell (Like GNOME in my case) but the app did FAST what I wanted (cut some parts form a longer video I shoot on my camera) in a very easy to understand and elegant way. I liked the small details like the flexible output file naming mathod etc.
Easy to use lightweight cutting tool. Useful if you just need to cut videos really quick and dont want to render them each time. Does what its supposed to do and works perfectly.
summary: Great for simple and fast cutting

description: Focusing on a specific use case allows this tool to be easy to use and lightening fast.

I had been missing the likes of Quicktime Player Pro on a Linux, heck even on Mac. This one not only replaces it as my defacto, but outsmarts it.
Excellent job. Donating on your page right away.
i so like it, it`s usefull for me
can't open any files...

flatpak version can't open any file, so its unusable.
back to arch/aur version of lossless cut.
No files when dragged in are supported, and the Open dialog only shows Downloads, Public, and Videos within Home. It can't look elsewhere.

For the folk that have issues importing files, be sure that all your files are in:
/home/[YOUR USERNAME]/Downloads

This is a flatpak that is sandboxed to the Downloads folder only.

Anyway, worked just fine for my meme-making purposes. 10/10. Highly recommend this tool.

I'm so satisfied with this app that I'll leave 5 stars here.

For those having a problem importing files, be sure to place them under Downloads folder OR! download flatseal and configure LosslessCut to access the rest of the system!

For everyone who is complaining about not being able to drag and drop files you just have to give the flatpak version permissions and then everything will work as intended. 

sudo flatpak override no.mifi.losslesscut --filesystem=host

I love this program. Have been using it for years (before it became a Flatpak).

– TD

The UI is so bad I got angry using this. Hint for new users: when the icon next to the Export button is blue, the Export button will show options instead of exporting. Click the blue icon to enable Exports.
summary: Horrible UI, fast output once you work out how to use it

description: Easy and extrimly fast. I am happy to cut my movies with it!
I tried to cut a video, but the exported segment always starts from the start and the user interface and help section is not very helpful
summary: The cut and export function didn't work

description: Works as well as you'd expect. For anyone that needs file permissions, download Flatseal and simply allow it access to your home folder.
All I wanted to do is cut video and all the other ones were complex. So simple a function. Excellent and easy to use!

Installing on Debian 12 kde, MX-kde 21, this version 3.55.1 and 3.56 also, are acting the same, can only run with open files within the app, will not work if use right click menu open or drag and drop, uninstall it and going back to version 3.54 AppImage, everything work wonderful on that version.
Working on a doc right now, and need to chop up highlight clips from 3 hour videos. It's great, you can label all the clips and quickly export them as you need or all at the end. Top-tier app.
summary: Amazing for chopping up long videos

description: LosslessCut is maybe the best open source GUI software for the lossless video cutting, joining, making compilation. I prefer AppImage from Github.
summary: Very good lossless video, audio cutting

description:
Glad to have this application to cut mp4 videos easily. 
File drag and drop as well as file open dialogue needs some fixing or rework.
Hasta el momento solo lo he usado un par de veces y me ha dado buenos resultados así que por el momento me encuentro contento
Очень долго искал программу, которая могла бы создавать главы в видео. Этот редактор оказался единственным решением, которое работает без багов.
